name: Come Out Fighting
description:
In Come Out Fighting, you control a M4 Sherman crew trying to escape Germany after the end of the World War II. Comparing to the German Panzers, the best strategy to follow is to avoid combat with the little M4 Sherman.
Be aware.
At the end of each turn, a bomber will destroy 3 random tiles on the map, because the map keeps changing and you can end up stuck.

How to Play Markers

The Fuel Marker is how much fuel is on the tank, it takes up to 10.

The Hull is the health of the tank, it goes up to 100 and if reaches 0 your tank will be destroyed.

Tokens

When scavenging, you can find 3 types of tokens.
The Fuel Token is used to refill the fuel marker with action Refuel.

The Ammo Token is used for every time you attack, if you don't have Ammo tokens you won't be able to attack.

The Parts Token is used to Repair your tank's Hull, each Token repairs 5 (of the 100) points on the Hull.

Objective

The Objective is to reach the final line of each of the two maps.

May 1945.
The Great War has ended, but not every soldier knows it.
The allies are leaving Europe, but Nazis are still fighting to survive in Germany.
The American crew of an M4 Sherman tries to leave the German territory for a safe place to the west.
Alone.
